input: Interest rates may be adjusted at the lender's sole discretion without prior notice.
expected_output: Arbitrary rate hikes without consumer consent.

input: To cancel, you must send a notarized letter via certified mail 90 days in advance.
We reserve the right to share your transaction history with unnamed affiliate partners.
expected_output: Third-party data monetization of sensitive finances.

input: Der Nutzer erklärt sich mit einer automatischen Verlängerung um 24 Monate einverstanden.
Failure to pay within 24 hours results in a 15% flat convenience fee.
The user waives any right to a trial by jury and agrees to binding arbitration in New York.
expected_output: Mandatory arbitration clause aiming to block class actions.

input: We may update these terms at any time, and your continued use constitutes acceptance.
A monthly inactivity fee of $5.00 will be charged if there are no transactions for 30 days.
You grant us a perpetual, irrevocable, worldwide license to use any content you upload.
expected_output: Excessive IP rights grab for user content.

input: The platform is provided 'as is' without any warranties, express or implied.
We track your location data even when the app is not in use to improve ad targeting.
If you terminate early, you must pay all remaining months of the 2-year contract immediately.
Disputes must be filed within 30 days of the incident or they are permanently waived.
We are not liable for any data breaches caused by third-party vendors used by us.
expected_output: Shift of liability for security failures.

input: Membership renews automatically at the then-current non-promotional rate.
expected_output: Auto-renewal into a higher price bracket.

input: You indemnify us against all legal claims arising from your use of the service.
We may suspend your account at any time for any reason without notice.
Access to your contact list is required for the app to function.
expected_output: Unnecessary data access akin to spyware.

input: A paper statement fee of $3.99 applies to each billing cycle.
We reserve the right to sell your browsing history to insurance providers.
expected_output: High-risk data sale that could affect real-world rates.

input: Prices are subject to change due to 'market conditions' at our discretion.
expected_output: Vague pricing terms allowing arbitrary hikes.

input: Any class action lawsuit is hereby waived by the user.
Cancellation requires a phone call to our retention line between 9 AM and 5 PM EST.
expected_output: Friction trap designed to discourage churn.

input: We claim ownership of any ideas or suggestions you submit to us.
A 3% foreign transaction fee applies to all international purchases.
The use of a VPN to access the service is strictly prohibited and grounds for ban.
We are not responsible for lost profits or consequential damages.
Your data is stored in servers located in jurisdictions with lower privacy standards.
We use cookies to track your activity across other websites.
An early exit fee of $200 applies if canceled within the first 6 months.
